metadata.inclusion:
1. Touch any button to wake the thermostat
2. Touch and hold the MODE button for 5 seconds
3. Scroll to 'Z-Wave' using buttons and touch FAN (Select)
4. Select YES in the Z-Wave Install screen
5. Touch FAN (Select)
The display will flash WAIT and then SUCCESS if inclusion is successful. WAIT then FAIL will flash if inclusion fails.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Touch any button to wake the thermostat
2. Touch and hold the MODE button for 5 seconds
3. Scroll to 'Z-Wave' using buttons and touch FAN (Select)
4. Select YES in the Z-Wave exclude screen
5. Touch FAN (Select)
The display will flash WAIT then SUCCESS if exclusion is successful. WAIT then FAIL will flash if exclusion fails.
metadata.reset:
1. Touch and hold MODE button to go to Setup menu
2. Touch and hold MODE and the down arrow key to enter Advanced Menu
3. Navigate to Restore Defaults to perform a factory reset
